title: Trend Micro Apex One Uncontrolled Search Path Element Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
description:
This vulnerability allows local attackers to escalate privileges on affected installations of Trend Micro Apex One. An attacker must first obtain the ability to execute low-privileged code on the target system in order to exploit this vulnerability.
The specific flaw exists within the configuration of OpenSSL. The process loads an OpenSSL configuration file from an unsecured location. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to escalate privileges and execute arbitrary code in the context of SYSTEM.
addtionnal_details: Trend Micro has issued an update to correct this vulnerability. More details can be found at:https://success.trendmicro.com/solution/000289229
timeline:
2021-05-13 - Vulnerability reported to vendor
2021-10-19 - Coordinated public release of advisory
